duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain thermoplastic extruders and associated production equipment to produce flexible plastic sheeting, tubing, or bags.
Review and analyze production order specifications to ensure availability of required equipment, packaging supplies, and raw materials.
Monitor finished film for quality and take corrective action if sub-standard product is detected.
Assist in training team members in operating procedures, safety, and quality policy under the direction of the Lead Operator.
Perform routine maintenance on production equipment and set up production equipment as directed.
